channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:39 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 10:39 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports. #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 10:24 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow for further updates.

item.title: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
